## Description

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test updates

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the project's [coding standards](docs/guides/standards/)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Tests added/updated (if applicable)
- [ ] All tests pass (`$env:AIMEETING_AGENT_MODE="stub"; dotnet test`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented in migration guide)
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventions (present tense, descriptive)

## Test Coverage
<!-- For code changes, include coverage information -->
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated (if needed)
- [ ] Coverage meets 80% threshold
